item.description: Update Structure Fire; INC#0412; 09:45AM; 4800 W Beverly Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3hBTr4W; #WindsorSquare; LAFD Firefighters rescued one dog and one cat from the smoke charged and burning upstairs apartment, as their colleagues aggressively battled flames that heavily damaged the kitchen and extended into the living room of the one damaged unit. Firefighters prevented the fire from extending into any of the other nine apartment units in the 7,456 square-foot building, which was not equipped with optional fire sprinklers. The presence of required functional smoke alarms within the involved unit was not immediately apparent. Both pets received a cursory medical examination by LAFD responders, and appeared to have no serious injury, before being safely returned to the care of their owner. There were no human injuries. The fire cause is considered accidental, and related to cooking. Though the involved apartment will be untenable until repairs are made, the five residents of the unit stated a desire to seek their own temporary accommodations.; FS 52; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 E227 E229 E29 E52 RA61 RA827 T27 T29; CH7; 13; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#0412; 09:00AM; 4800 W Beverly Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3hBTr4W; #WindsorSquare; 26 Firefighters took just 12 minutes in a well-coordinated firefighting offense to access, confine and fully extinguish a kitchen fire within one 2nd floor apartment, at a 7,456 square-foot, 10 unit, two-story garden-style apartment building. Firefighters rescued and are now evaluating the needs of one pet dog from the involved apartment unit. No human injury. Specific fire cause under investigation.; FS 52; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 E227 E229 E29 E52 RA61 RA827 T27 T29; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#0412; 08:48AM; 4800 W Beverly Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3hBTr4W; #WindsorSquare; PRELIM: Fire showing from the 2nd floor of a 2 story apartment building.; FS 52; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 E227 E229 E29 E52 RA61 RA827 T27 T29; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#0369; 07:56AM; 10740 W Moorpark St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3pBG2OR; #TolucaLake; 34 Firefighters took just 12 minutes to access, confine and extinguish a fully involved detached garage with dense interior storage, to the rear of a one-story home. Firefighters prevented damage to the pair of nearby structures threatened by flames. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 86; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC14 E227 E260 E60 E76 E86 EM14 RA60 RA86 RA860 T27 T60; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey

Update Traffic Collision; INC#1526; 07:30PM; 248 W 108th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3vARf68; #BroadwayManchester; Occupied full-size L.A. Unified School District bus (unknown school/function/destination or passenger load) was struck by a vehicle. No physical entrapment. 8 patients total. Unknown age/gender/condition/affiliation/circumstances) One patient will be transported by LAFD ambulance to a hospital shortly, for unspecified injury. Condition undetermined. Others now being medically evaluated at scene. High voltage wires down. LADWP en route, unknown ETA. Media Inquiries: LAPD South Traffic (Incident #4430), CHP (Log #2685), LAUSD, and LASD Century (reportedly first agency at scene).; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E64 EM13 RA64 RA65 RA815 RA864; CH4; 13; Brian Humphrey

Unknown if injuries. No further details: Media Inquiries: LAPD South Traffic (Incident #4430), CHP (Log #2685); FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; E64 RA64 RA864; CH4; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1094; 03:26PM; 244 W 53rd St; MAP: https://bit.ly/35H2FKw; #SouthParkDistrict; First arriving 30 Firefighters took 22 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish an outside fire that caused unspecified (believed minor) damage to as many as three exposed structures, including a nearby church. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC11 BC13 E21 E215 E221 E233 E33 E46 EM13 RA46 RA66 RA846 SQ21 T15 T21 T33; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#0611; 10:38AM; 1360 S Figueroa St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ICiCA9; #Downtown; First arriving LAFD personnel report an outside fire confined to a fifth floor balcony extinguished on their arrival. No injury. Firefighters will remain at scene to exhaust smoke from the building. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 E10 E203 E210 E215 E3 E4 RA11 RA810 RA813 SQ21 T10 T15 T3 T9; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey
